title: pSX 1.13+RPG Fan Bundle
description:
pSX 1.13 Emulator + RPG fan bundle.

*All final fantasy games relased for the psx including chrono trigger.

*Parasite EvE

*Legend of mana

*CAPCOMS "Breath Of Fire 4"

*pSX bios also included

**These games seem to work just fine with this emulator.I have played them all with no problems.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT. All psx games are located in the CDimages Folder. The bios "SCPH1001.BIN" is located in the bios folder.
There is no need to move these files,just open the pSX emulator(click on the psxfin.exe),configure and play.
I Recommend looking over the readme included in the pSX 1.13 folder.DO NOT open a game without first configuring the
Memorycards,video options,and your controller/keyboard to save yourself any hassle in the future.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

install notes:

unrar pSX 1.13 with the winrar program to any folder you desire to play pSX.

Minimum System Requirements:

CPU: 750 MHz 
Memory: 192 MB ram 
CD-ROM: 2x read, ASPI-compatible, or any CD-compatible virtual drive 

Recommended System Requirements:

CPU: 1.3 GHz 
Memory: 256 MB RAM 
CD-ROM: 16x read, ASPI-compatible, or any CD-compatible virtual drive 

Windows-specific Requirements:

OS: Windows 98 or higher 
Graphics: DirectX9-compatible graphics card (non-integrated recommended) 
Sound: DirectX-compatible sound card  
Other: Latest release of DirectX9

Linux-specific Requirements:

Kernel: Linux 2.6.x 
Graphics: OpenGL and supporting graphics card 
Sound: ALSA, sound card that supports 20ms period or below highly recommended 
Other: libgtkglext (a library used to add OpenGL support to GTK+ widgets)
